content.raw: Looks good to me. I'm going to approve it, as I managed to build Ignition Transport on Xenial and test it on CI too (with some custom branches). See [here](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/43/). There's still work to be done on CI to see if there are issues on Homebrew or Windows but looks promising.
